alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:45PM CDT until May 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 645 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hume, or 11 miles southeast of Pleasanton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Richards, Deerfield, Metz, Stotesbury and Horton. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 99 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
